comment:
Far too much Analysis Paralysis during both games. This game isn't sufficiently interesting to justify waiting ten minutes between turns with six players, just to play a card I've already decided on and say "Next". Yes, it's more strategic than 6 Nimmt. But the delays kill the push your luck excitement of its predecessor game.

4/10. And I went to buy 6 Nimmt today, the game I enjoy: 8/10.
Very light gap-filler. Too light for me.

(15x) ENJOYMENT:                         Forgettable     Outstanding
(10x) DEPTH (IN RELATION TO COMPLEXITY): Lacking         Meaty
 (5x) LUCK FACTOR:                       All Luck        All Skill
 (3x) REPLAYABILITY:                     Nil             Limitless
(10x) MECHANICS:                         Boring          Interesting
 (4x) PLAYER INTERACTION:                Low             High
 (4x) PLAYER COUNT PERFORMANCE:          Not Balanced    Balanced
 (2x) GAME LENGTH:                       Too Short/Long  Just Right
 (2x) CLARITY OF RULES:                  Mud             Crystal
 (5x) COMPONENT QUALITY:                 Cheap           World Class

INITIAL RATING (sum(Criteria Rating x Criteria Weight)/Total Weight) = 5.2
some of my friends hate this game
Second only to wavelength for groups of people. A game that plays itself.
